review: Got two of these for my new home, and they both work great once updated and set up. If your TV has USB ports, the amount of wire clutter this saves you cannot be understated.One of the two had problems connecting to the Internet through my router, so I used my LG G3 Android phone hotspot and the dongle managed to get the required initial software updated. After that, I reconfigured it to connect with my router and it works perfectly.All my devices -- Windows 8.1 laptop, Android phone and iPad -- work seamlessly with the Chromecast. The Chromecast icon appears automatically if the dongle is powered on (either by the TV or external power).If you have more than one Chromecast, I would recommend naming them intuitively so you don't connect to the wrong one by accident (and interrupt someone else's viewing!).Highly recommended for those looking for a fuss-free solution to TV content streaming. I mainly use Netflix, Hulu Plus and YouTube.
